body:
v0.24.0 adds automatic stripping of ANSI escape codes from command output using the strip-ansi-escapes crate.

This allows testing CLI tools that output colored text without needing to disable colors or match escape sequences.

Implementation:
- Added strip-ansi-escapes = "0.2" dependency
- Both run_command() and run_command_streaming() strip ANSI codes
- Stripping happens per-line in streaming mode, on combined output in normal mode

Test: test/ansi_stripping/ verifies bold, color, 256-color, RGB, and cursor movement codes are all stripped.
title: cctr strips ANSI escape codes from command output
